name: Nutcracker
storyline:
The king was so happy that he invited all of his subjects to a royal Christmas feast. The tower bells were rung and the people laughed and danced in honor of the new Princess. Hidden in the shadows, the Queen of Rats watching grew angrier and angrier. 
 
Do not fear, for there is hope. A brave Knight can rid the little Princess of the evil spell, at a special time, on one particular day in a year. It is on Magical Christmas Night. 
 
By arming himself with a popgun, the Brave Knight cannot only be more successful fighting his enemies but he can also break the glass, Christmas balls that block his way. The Christmas baloons can be popped with the saber. 
 
So brave Knight, if you are very courageous, go ahead and give it a try. Do your best to avoid the King and Queen of Rats and rescue the beautiful little Princess on Magical Christmas Night!
